targets.query:
.show tables details
| summarize dcount(TableName)

AdxmonIngestorTableCardinalityCount
| where Timestamp >= ago(30m)
| extend Table=tostring(Labels.table)
| summarize Value=round(avg(Value)) by bin(Timestamp, 1m), Table
| summarize Value=sum(Value) by bin(Timestamp, 1m)
| order by Timestamp asc

.show extents 
| summarize Samples=sum(RowCount)
| extend AMCost=(Samples/10e6)*0.16

AdxmonCollectorHealthCheck
| where Timestamp >= ago(30m)
| summarize dcount(Host)

ContainerCpuUsageSecondsTotal
| where Timestamp >= ago(30m)
| where Cluster == "$Cluster"
| distinct tostring(Labels.pod)
| summarize Value=count()

AdxmonIngestorSamplesStoredTotal
| where Timestamp >= ago(30m)
| where Timestamp < ago(5m)
| where Container == "ingestor"
| invoke prom_delta()
| summarize Value=sum(Value)/60 by bin(Timestamp, 1m), Pod
| summarize Value=sum(Value) by bin(Timestamp, 1m)

AdxmonIngestorWalSegmentsMaxAgeSeconds
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| where Cluster == "$Cluster"
| where Pod startswith "ingestor"
| where Value != 9223372036.8547764
| make-series Value=avg(Value) on Timestamp from ago(30m) to now() step 60000ms
| extend mvg=series_fir(Value, repeat(1, 5), true, true)
| extend mvg=array_slice(mvg, 0, array_length(mvg)-5)
| extend Value=mvg[array_length(mvg)-1]
| project Value

AdxmonIngestorWalSegmentsMaxAgeSeconds
| where Timestamp >= ago(30m) and Timestamp <= now()
| where Cluster == "$Cluster"
| where Container == "ingestor"
| where Value != 9223372036.8547764
| make-series Value=max(Value) on Timestamp from ago(30m) to now() step 60000ms
| extend mvg=series_fir(Value, repeat(1, 5), true, true)
| extend mvg=array_slice(mvg, 0, array_length(mvg)-5)
| extend Value=mvg[array_length(mvg)-1]
| project Value

AdxmonIngestorWalSegmentsSizeBytes
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| where Cluster == "$Cluster"
| extend metric=tostring(Labels.metric)
| summarize Value=max(Value) by bin(Timestamp, 5m), metric, Host
| summarize Value=sum(Value) by bin(Timestamp, 5m), Host
| summarize avg(Value) by Timestamp
| order by Timestamp asc

.show extents 
| summarize MinCreate=min(MinCreatedOn), MaxCreate=max(MaxCreatedOn)
| extend TimeRange=MaxCreate - MinCreate
| extend Rention=strcat(format_timespan(TimeRange, 'dd'), " days")
| project-away MinCreate, MaxCreate, TimeRange

.show extents 
| summarize sum(ExtentSize+IndexSize)

.show extents 
| summarize sum(OriginalSize)

AdxmonIngestorSamplesStoredTotal
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| where Cluster == "$Cluster"
| where Pod startswith "ingestor"
| invoke prom_delta()
| summarize sum(Value)/($__timeInterval/1s) by bin(Timestamp, $__timeInterval)
| order by Timestamp asc

AdxmonIngestorRequestsReceivedTotal
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| where Cluster == "$Cluster"
| where Container == "ingestor"
| invoke prom_delta()
| extend code=tostring(Labels.code)
| extend path=tostring(Labels.path)
| summarize Avg=sum(Value)/($__timeInterval/1s) by bin(Timestamp, $__timeInterval), code, path
| order by Timestamp asc, code, path
| project Timestamp, code, path, Avg

AdxmonIngestorWalSegmentsMaxAgeSeconds
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| where Cluster == "$Cluster"
| where Container == "ingestor"
| where Value != 9223372036.8547764
| make-series Value=max(Value) on Timestamp from $__timeFrom to $__timeTo step $__timeInterval by Pod
| extend stats=series_stats_dynamic(Value)
| order by toreal(stats.max) desc
| limit 10
| project Pod, Timestamp, Value

AdxmonIngestorRequestsReceivedTotal
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| where Cluster == "$Cluster"
| where Container == "ingestor"
| invoke prom_delta()
| extend code=tostring(Labels.code)
| summarize Avg=sum(Value)/($__timeInterval/1s) by bin(Timestamp, $__timeInterval), Host
| order by Timestamp asc, Host
| project Timestamp, Host, Avg

AdxmonIngestorWalSegmentsCount
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| where Cluster == "$Cluster"
| where Container == "ingestor"
| extend metric=tostring(Labels.metric)
| summarize Value=avg(Value) by bin(Timestamp, $__timeInterval), Host, metric
| make-series Value=sum(Value) on Timestamp from $__timeFrom to $__timeTo step $__timeInterval by Host
| extend stats=series_stats_dynamic(Value)
| order by toreal(stats.max) desc
| limit 10
| project Host, Timestamp, Value

AdxmonIngestorTableCardinalityCount
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| extend table = tostring(Labels.table)
| make-series Value=avg(Value) default = 0 on Timestamp from $__timeFrom to $__timeTo step $__timeInterval by table
| extend stats=series_stats_dynamic(Value)
| order by toint(stats.max) desc
| project Timestamp, table, Value
| limit 10 
| extend Value=series_fill_forward(Value, 0)

AdxmonIngestorWalSegmentsSizeBytes
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| where Cluster == "$Cluster"
| where Container == "ingestor"
| extend metric=tostring(Labels.metric)
| summarize hint.shufflekey=Host Value=avg(Value) by bin(Timestamp, $__timeInterval), metric, Host
| make-series Value=sum(Value) default = 0 on Timestamp from $__timeFrom to $__timeTo step $__timeInterval by Host
| extend stats=series_stats_dynamic(Value)
| order by toreal(stats.max) desc
| limit 10
| project Host, Timestamp, Value

AdxmonIngestorQueueSize
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| where Cluster == "$Cluster"
| where Container == "ingestor"
| extend queue=tostring(Labels.queue)
| where queue == "upload"
| make-series Value=sum(Value) default = 0 on Timestamp from $__timeFrom to $__timeTo step $__timeInterval by queue, Host
| extend stats=series_stats_dynamic(Value)
| order by toreal(stats.max) desc
| limit 10
| project queue, Host, Timestamp, Value

AdxmonIngestorQueueSize
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| where Cluster == "$Cluster"
| where Container == "ingestor"
| extend queue=tostring(Labels.queue)
| where queue == "transfer"
| make-series Value=sum(Value) default = 0 on Timestamp from $__timeFrom to $__timeTo step $__timeInterval by queue, Host
| extend stats=series_stats_dynamic(Value)
| order by toreal(stats.max) desc
| limit 10
| project queue, Host, Timestamp, Value

let buckets=50;
let binSize=toscalar(ContainerCpuUsageSecondsTotal
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| where Cluster=="$Cluster"
| where Labels.cpu=="total"
| where Labels.namespace == "adx-mon"
| extend Namespace=tostring(Labels.namespace)
| extend Pod=tostring(Labels.pod)
| extend Container=tostring(Labels.container)
| where Container == "ingestor"
| invoke prom_delta()
| summarize Value=(max(Value)/60) by bin(Timestamp, 60000ms), Namespace, Pod
| summarize min(Value), max(Value), avg(Value)
| extend Diff=(max_Value - min_Value) / buckets
| project Diff);
ContainerCpuUsageSecondsTotal
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| where Cluster=="$Cluster"
| where Labels.cpu=="total"
| where Labels.namespace == "adx-mon"
| extend Namespace=tostring(Labels.namespace)
| extend Pod=tostring(Labels.pod)
| extend Container=tostring(Labels.container)
| where Container == "ingestor"
| invoke prom_rate()
| summarize Value=round(avg(Value)+0.0005,3) by bin(Timestamp, 60000ms), Pod
| summarize Value=count() by Timestamp, Bin=round(bin(Value, toreal(binSize)), 3)
| order by Timestamp asc
| project Timestamp, tostring(Bin), Value

ContainerMemoryWorkingSetBytes
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| where Cluster=="$Cluster"
| extend Namespace=tostring(Labels.namespace)
| extend Pod=tostring(Labels.pod)
| extend Container=tostring(Labels.container)
| where Namespace == "adx-mon"
| where Container == "ingestor"
| extend Value=Value
| summarize Value=avg(Value) by bin(Timestamp, 60000ms), Namespace, Pod
| summarize Value=count() by Timestamp, Bin=bin(Value, 5e6), Namespace
| project Timestamp, tostring(Bin), Value
| order by Timestamp asc

let buckets=50;
let binSize=toscalar(ContainerCpuUsageSecondsTotal
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| where Cluster=="$Cluster"
| where Labels.cpu=="total"
| where Labels.namespace == "adx-mon"
| extend Namespace=tostring(Labels.namespace)
| extend Pod=tostring(Labels.pod)
| extend Container=tostring(Labels.container)
| where Container == "collector"
| invoke prom_delta()
| summarize Value=(max(Value)/60) by bin(Timestamp, 60000ms), Namespace, Pod
| summarize min(Value), max(Value), avg(Value)
| extend Diff=(max_Value - min_Value) / buckets
| project Diff);
ContainerCpuUsageSecondsTotal
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| where Cluster=="$Cluster"
| where Labels.cpu=="total"
| where Labels.namespace == "adx-mon"
| extend Namespace=tostring(Labels.namespace)
| extend Pod=tostring(Labels.pod)
| extend Container=tostring(Labels.container)
| where Container == "collector"
| invoke prom_rate()
| summarize Value=round(avg(Value)+0.0005,3) by bin(Timestamp, 60000ms), Pod
| summarize Value=count() by Timestamp, Bin=round(bin(Value, toreal(binSize)), 3)
| order by Timestamp asc
| project Timestamp, tostring(Bin), Value

ContainerMemoryWorkingSetBytes
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| where Labels !has "id"
| where Cluster=="$Cluster"
| extend Namespace=tostring(Labels.namespace)
| extend Pod=tostring(Labels.pod)
| extend Container=tostring(Labels.container)
| where Namespace == "adx-mon"
| where Container == "collector"
| extend Value=Value
| summarize Value=avg(Value) by bin(Timestamp, 60000ms), Namespace, Pod
| summarize Value=count() by Timestamp, Bin=bin(Value, 1e7), Namespace
| project Timestamp, tostring(Bin), Value
| order by Timestamp asc
